item.title: How To Install Python 3 on Windows 11
item.description: This article will walk through the steps to install python3 on Windows 11 in order to use the python package tube-cast. Use the Executable Installer Head over to python.org and download the latest version of python. Launch the Executable Installer When the download is finished, open up the Installer. Before installing Select the check box Add Python 3.10 to PATH. Confirm Installation To confirm the installation was successful open command prompt and type
